overview: Forced by life, Yang Xiaoming is desperate. He finally musters up the courage to ask his boss for his salary, but he is accidentally involved in the robbery. Yang Xiaoming, who was taken to the gloomy supermarket, woke up and found that there were many chilly zombies around him. He was terrified, but he had no way to escape. In the supermarket, Yang Xiaoming ran into Huizi, a long-time famous actress and out of tune agent. When he was in danger, Yang Xiaoming finally found out the truth and had a deep understanding of his agent and actress. Suddenly, Yang Xiaoming plans to leave the supermarket, only to find that he is not so easy to get away...
title: 嘿店
